Ooma Office for WeWork pricing chart

With Ooma Office for WeWork, you only need to pay for the services, capacity, and equipment that you use. We’ve created the chart below to outline the prices for each product and service that can be added on so that you can make informed decisions as you customize and grow your business telephone setup.

USD Price CAD Price Billing Frequency
Ooma Office for WeWork base price (includes IP phone rental and a local phone number) $50.00 $60.00 Monthly
Capacity
User extension (includes IP phone rental, virtual fax, and a local phone number) $50.00 $60.00 Monthly
Local phone number $9.95 $14.95 Monthly
Toll free phone number (includes 500 minutes, 3.4¢ per additional minute) $9.95 $14.95 Monthly
Conference bridge (includes phone number) Free Free N/A
Ring groups Free Free N/A
Virtual receptionist Free Free N/A
Services
Number porting Free* Free* N/A
International calling Varies by use Varies by use Deducted from prepaid account after each call

* Phone number porting is complimentary for all regular US and Canada phone numbers, and for any applicable toll-free numbers. Once your number or numbers have been ported to your account, they can be assigned to a user. The first phone number that is assigned to each user is complimentary. Additional phone numbers will be billed at the standard rate of $9.99/month for US users, or CAD $14.95/month for Canadian users, for each number.
